mapper.insert: INSERT INTO corona_info.corona_info (accExamCnt, accExamCompCnt, careCnt, clearCnt, deathCnt, decideCnt, examCnt, resultNegCnt, stateTime) VALUES (#{accExamCnt}, #{accExamCompCnt}, #{careCnt}, #{clearCnt}, #{deathCnt}, #{decideCnt}, #{examCnt}, #{resultNegCnt}, #{stateTime});
mapper.select: select * from corona_info where stateTime >= str_to_date('2021-07-01', "%Y-%m-%d")
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sido_info (createDt, deathCnt, defCnt, gubun, incDec, isolClearCnt, isolIngCnt, localOccCnt, overFlowCnt) VALUES (#{createDt}, #{deathCnt}, #{defCnt}, #{gubun}, #{incDec}, #{isolClearCnt}, #{isolIngCnt}, #{localOccCnt}, #{overFlowCnt});
mapper.select: select * from sido_info where createDt >= str_to_date(#{date}, "%Y-%m-%d") and gubun != '합계'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO age_info (confCase, confCaseRate, createDt, criticalRate, death, deathRate, gubun) VALUES(#{confCase}, #{confCaseRate}, #{createDt}, #{criticalRate}, #{death}, #{deathRate}, #{gubun})
mapper.select: select * from age_info where gubun != '여성' and gubun != '남성' and date_format(createDt, "%Y-%m-%d") = str_to_date(#{date}, "%Y-%m-%d")
select * from age_info where (gubun = '여성' or gubun = '남성') and date_format(createDt, "%Y-%m-%d") = str_to_date(#{date}, "%Y-%m-%d")

select * , case when sido = '서울특별시' then '서울' when sido = '부산광역시' then '부산' when sido = '대구광역시' then '대구' when sido = '인천광역시' then '인천' when sido = '광주광역시' then '광주' when sido = '대전광역시' then '대전' when sido = '울산광역시' then '울산' when sido = '세종특별자치시' then '세종' when sido = '경기도' then '경기' when sido = '강원도' then '강원' when sido = '충청북도' then '충북' when sido = '충청남도' then '충남' when sido = '전라북도' then '전북' when sido = '전라남도' then '전남' when sido = '경상북도' then '경북' when sido = '경상남도' then '경남' when sido = '제주특별자치도' then '제주' end as region from vaccine_info where date_format(regDt, '%Y-%m-%d') = str_to_date(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d') and sido != '전국';
